name: Role-Adventure Game
description:
This is the first version of the Role (not yet) - Adventure Game.  It contains no turn-based battles,  collectable items, and more things that are about to come (I hope).

Controls:

      W (up)  -  A (left) -  S (down)   -  D (right)

       K (attack)  -  M (battle menu)  -  N (hide menu)

       Tip:  Battle Menu is only accessible (M)  when enemies are near.

Art:

     https://finalbossblues.itch.io/fairy-forest-tileset
     https://sillas-frota.itch.io/chest-opening
     https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-portal-sprites
     https://szadiart.itch.io/animated-character-pac

Music:

     https://magic-spark.itch.io/a-bit-of-chiptune

Game Design & Programming:

     https://bl4ckrose.itch.io/

     https://ofeliaaoe.itch.io/

Instructions:

     Download the compressed file, extract the files and then run  "rpg_game_v1.exe".
